Human.description: Humans are known for their adaptability and endurance, able to survive no matter the environment.

Elf.description: Elves are known for their quick thinking and intellect, making them natural scholars and explorers.

Tiefling.description: Tieflings are known for their natural attractiveness, which blends well with their perceptive nature as they navigate away from their Canrean homeland.

Dwarf.description: Dwarves are native to the edge of Western Irea, and are a rare sight outside of their homelands. They are known for their willpower and determination.

Acolyte.description: Acolytes have spent their lives in service to a specific god, or pantheon of gods, and can range from clerics to priests.

Merchant.description: Merchants make a living through selling their goods and predicting where they should travel to get the highest profits.

Courtier.description: Courtiers navigate the world of nobility, surviving plots and starting their own as they try to climb the social ladder.

Mercenary.description: Mercenaries work for anyone willing to pay for their services, often roaming to wherever their next contract takes them.

Soldier.description: Soldiers are taught how to defend their homes, and receive training to boost their physical capabilities.

Scout.description: Scouts move fast and report on anything they come across that is of note. They are employed by armies, prospectors and mercenary companies.

abilities.Strength: Determines physical prowess, affecting combat effectiveness and threats.
abilities.Charm: Influences negotiation and diplomacy, and most importantly prices.
abilities.Cunning: Influences cleverness in social situations, mostly being used to exploit and profit.
abilities.Intelligence: Governs problem-solving abilities, especially your skill at analyzing markets.
abilities.Dexterity: Affects agility and precision, impacting the navigation skill and finesse.
abilities.Endurance: Governs how far you can travel before needing to rest.
abilities.Perception: Enhances awareness and observation skills, allowing you to spot traps, dangers or tricks.
abilities.Luck: Represents fortune or fate, governing the natural providence you receive.
